initialScreen.secondLine: We're thrilled to have you onboard. To ensure you get the most out of our app and stay up-to-date with the latest news, we recommend granting permission for push notifications.
initialScreen.thirdLine: While it's entirely optional at this point, enabling push notifications will enhance your experience by delivering breaking news alerts and personalized updates right to your device.
initialScreen.fourthLine: However, if you prefer not to enable these permissions right now, no worries! You can always activate them manually later from the settings screen whenever you're ready.
initialScreen.fifthLine: Once again, thank you for choosing Hacker News. We hope you enjoy exploring the world of news with us!

settingsScreen.pushNotificationsDerscription: Keep push notifications enabled to recieve updates based on your interests.
